column4: Heimark: however as a general rule *nix to *nix is better done with NFS :)
true, but I use samba as most friends that come over to get on wireless use windows still and it makes life easier to just have a share they can connect to
sure, you should also check out giver. Its a neat tool for sharing files over a LAN and is cross platform
true, I just tend to tell people the most headache free way that I've seen to avoid ongoing issues.
